name: Furystoker

skills.name: Crush
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 15% chance of placing an extra hit.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Damage +5%

skills.name: Remedy
skills.raw_description:
Removes all debuffs from a target ally. Heals the target by 20%. The heal increases according to the amount of debuffs removed.
Lvl. 2 Heal +5%
Lvl. 3 Heal +5%
Lvl. 4 Heal +5%
Lvl. 5 Heal +5%

skills.name: Forest Kin
skills.raw_description: Heals the ally with the lowest HP by 7.5% each turn. This heal can be critical. Will not heal this Champion.
